title.rendered: Launch of the Social Entrepreneurship Barometer – 5th Edition

content.rendered:

Thursday, January 12, 2017 from 5.30 to 9pm
KPMG – Tour Eqho | 2 avenue Gambetta, Paris La Défense

Since 2011, Convergences has published the Social Entrepreneurship Barometer in partnership with Ashoka, BNP Paribas, Fondation CHANEL, France Active, KPMG, Mouves and OpinionWay.

For its 5th edition, the Social Entrepreneurship Barometer explores the impact of social entrepreneurship on cities and territories. By highlighting portraits pf entrepreneurs and their inspiring initiatives, this Barometer shows how social entrepreneurship can be a powerful lever for a transition towards more inclusive and sustainable territories.

Convergences and the partners of the Barometer are delighted to invite you to the launch of this new edition, which will take place on January 12, 2017 at the premises of KPMG.

The launch will be the opportunity for you to discover the exlusive 2016 results of the OpinionWay survey on the perception of social entrepreneurship in France. You will also get the chance to come and talk with entrepreneurs and experts on how to multiply the impact of social entrepreneurship on our cities and territories.

 

***

 

Programme :

6pm – 6.20pm: Welcoming of participants

6.20pm – 6.30pm: Introductory Words

6.30pm – 8pm: Conference & debate

Theme 1: Citizen mobilization

Theme 2: Dynamization of territories

Theme 3: International spin-off

8pm – 8.05pm: Concluding words

8 – 9pm: Cocktail

The Entrepreneurship Barometer

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”dark” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Since 2011, Convergences has published the Barometer of Social Entrepreneurship in partnership with Ashoka, BNP Paribas, Fondation CHANEL, France Active, KPMG, Mouves and OpinionWay.

The BES presents key issues and trends in the social entrepreneurship sector in France and internationally and promotes good practices in the sector. It addresses the entire ecosystem of social entrepreneurship – entrepreneurs, funders, catalysts and public authorities – and also targets professionals in related sectors, students and the media.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” url_new_window=”off” button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_button=”on” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ button_url=”https://www.convergences.org/nos-publications/105006-2/” button_text=”See all publications” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_border_color=”#ffffff”] [/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

For its 5th edition, the Social Entrepreneurship Barometer explores the impact of social entrepreneurship on cities […]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Depuis 2011, Convergences publie en partenariat avec Ashoka, BNP Paribas, Fondation CHANEL, France Active, KPMG, Mouves et OpinionWay le Baromère de l’Entrepreneuriat Social (BES). Pour sa 5ème édition, le Baromètre de l’Entrepreneuriat Social explore l’impact de l’entreprenariat social comme un levier puissant pour une transition vers des territoires plus inclusifs et durables en mettant en avant des portraits d’entrepreneurs et des initiatives inspirantes sur le thème des « Villes et territoires durables ».

Convergences et les partenaires du Baromètre sont ravis de vous inviter au lancement de cette nouvelle édition qui aura lieu le 12 janvier 2017 dans les locaux de KPMG.
Découvrez en exclusivité les résultats 2016 du sondage OpinionWay sur la perception de l’entrepreneuriat social en France, et venez échanger avec des entrepreneurs et experts sur comment démultiplier l'impact du secteur sur nos territoires.

Pour plus d’informations sur le programme, cliquez ici.
